#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int L[460][460][460];
int main()
{
	int T, len, temp,ans,m;
	int i, j, k;
    string X,Y,Z;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
	    cin>>X;
	    cin>>Y;
	    cin>>Z;
		len =X.length();
   memset(L,0,sizeof(L));
   m=len;
   for (i=1; i<=m; i++)
   {
     for (j=1; j<=m; j++)
     {
     	for (k=1; k<=m; k++)
     	{
       		if (X[i-1] == Y[j-1]&&X[i-1] == Z[k-1])
       		{
                L[i][j][k] = L[i-1][j-1][k-1] + 1;
       		}
       		else
                L[i][j][k] = max(L[i][j][k-1], max(L[i][j-1][k],L[i-1][j][k]));
        }
     }
   }
		temp = L[m][m][m];
		ans=(len-temp)*3;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
